  • 师资信息
  • 离退休教师
    胡 博助理研究员

    办公电话：16619819259

    电子邮箱：hubo@mail.tsinghua.edu.cn

    通讯地址：李兆基大楼A448

    邮编：100084

    教育背景

    2006.09-2010.07  同济大学机械与能源工程学院 机械设计制造及其自动化 学士

    2007.09-2009.07  复旦大学经济学院 经济学 辅修学士

    2010.09-2013.07  江苏大学流体机械工程技术研究中心(国家水泵及系统工程技术研究中心) 流体机械及工程 硕士

    2013.10-2018.07  德国杜伊斯堡-埃森大学机械与环境工程学院 透平机械 博士

    工作履历

    2018.01-2018.06  德国杜伊斯堡埃森大学机械与环境工程学院 科研助理

    2018.10-2020.10  清华大学能源与动力工程系 博士后

    2020.11至今  清华大学能源与动力工程系 助理研究员

    研究领域

    燃气轮机二次空气系统流动及传热机理

    燃气轮机关键构件结构强度及可靠性分析

    叶轮机械瞬态多物理场耦合方法

    叶轮机械密封系统设计

    多相流

    研究概况

    在研科研项目

    1. 基于数据驱动建模的预旋射流对盘腔旋流非定常作用机理研究，国家自然科学基金青年科学基金项目

    2. 考虑碳中和的电力市场调研，企事业单位委托课题

    3. 透平不同气封结构的密封效果分析, 企事业单位委托课题

    已完成科研项目

    1. 考虑快速变负荷特性的重型燃气轮机焊接转子瞬态多物理场耦合方法研究，基础研究中心国际合作项目

    2. XXX联合循环原理构型, 基础研究中心重大项目专题

    3. 过渡工况下动力涡轮叶片设计校核，企事业单位委托课题

    4. 冷却空气进气预旋装置流量对转子轴向力影响计算分析，企事业单位委托课题

    5. 300MW级F级燃机GH3536合金蜂窝封严结构件试制, 企事业单位委托课题

    6. 燃气轮机预旋进气转静盘腔流动及传热特性核算,企事业单位委托课题

    7. XXX可靠性设计方法、验证及标准规范, 重大专项专题（参与）

    8. XXX燃气轮机改进型高压涡轮冷却叶片设计校核,企事业单位委托课题（参与）

    学术成果

    期刊论文：

    1. Botao Lai, Xuesong Li, Chunwei Gu, Bo Hu*, The application of acceleration approach on investigating the transient multi-physical field prediction in a power turbine with welded rotor, Applied thermal engineering，https://doi.org/10.1016/j.applthermaleng.2025.125664

    2. Shida Yu, Xiaodong Ren, Bo Hu, Chunwei Gu，Investigation of control strategies for the hydrogen fueled R-Graz cycle, International Journal of Hydrogen Energy, https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ijhydene.2024.10.258.

    3. Yulong Yao, Bo Hu, Hui Wang, et al. Centrifugal through-flow rotor-stator cavity boundary layer transition based on the effect of roughness, Physics of Fluids, 36(10).

    4. Bo Hu, Yulong Yao, Chuan Wang, et al. Investigation on the heat transfer characteristics of rotor-stator cavity with different disk roughness, International Communications in Heat and Mass Transfer, https://doi.org/10.1016/j.icheatmasstransfer.2024.107989.

    5. Bo Hu, Yulong Yao, Chuan Wang, et al. The effect of rotor roughness on flow and heat transfer in rotor-stator cavities with different axial gap. Applied thermal engineering, https://doi.org/10.1016/j.applthermaleng.2024.123535.

    6. Bo Hu, Jiachi Yao, Ning An, et al. Numerical investigation on the effects of HC geometry on the flow and heat transfer in the disk cavity system at the turbine vane root. Applied thermal engineering, https://doi.org/10.1016/j.applthermaleng.2023.120794.

    7. Bo Hu, Yulong Yao, Minfeng Wang, et al. Flow and Performance of the Disk Cavity of a Marine Gas Turbine at Varying Nozzle Pressure and Low Rotation Speeds: A Numerical Investigation. Machines, 2023, 11, 68. https://doi.org/10.3390/machines11010068.

    8. Bo Hu, Chuan Wang, Hui Wang, Qian Yu, Jinhua Liu, Yong Zhu, Jie Ge, Xinxin Chen and Yang Yang. Numerical Simulation Study of the Horizontal Submerged Jet Based on the Wray–Agarwal Turbulence Model, J. Mar. Sci. Eng. 2022, 10, 1217. https://doi.org/10.3390/jmse10091217

    9. Bo Hu, Hui Wang, Jinhua Liu, Yong Zhu , Chuan Wang, Jie Ge and Yingchong Zhang. A Numerical Study of a Submerged Water Jet Impinging on a Stationary Wall, J. Mar. Sci. Eng. 2022, 10, 228. https://doi.org/10.3390/jmse10020228.

    10. Bo Hu, Xuesong Li, Yanxia Fu, et al. Experimental Investigation on the Flow and Flow-Rotor Heat Transfer in a Rotor-Stator Spinning Disk Reactor, Applied thermal engineering 2019, 162 (2019) 114316, doi:10.1016/j.applthermaleng.2019.114316.

    11. Bo Hu, Xuesong Li, Xiaodong Ren, et al. Numerical investigation on Flow and Rotor-Flow Heat Transfer in a Rotor-Stator Cavity with Centripetal Carbon Dioxide Through-Flow, Energies 2019, 12, 2613; doi:10.3390/en12132613.

    12. Bo Hu, Xuesong Li, Yanxia Fu, et al. Axial thrust, disk frictional losses, and heat transfer in a gas turbine disk cavity，Energies. 2019, 12, 2917; doi:10.3390/en12152917.

    13. Shida Yu, Bo Hu, Xuesong Li, et al. Thermo dynamic and economic analysis of a revised Graz cycle using pure oxygen and hydrogen fuel, International Journal of Hydrogen Energy, 2023, https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ijhydene.2023.06.157.

    14. Chuan Wang, Bo Hu, Yong Zhu*, Xiuli Wang, Can Luo and Li Cheng*. Numerical Study on the Gas-water Two-phase Flow in the Self-Priming Process of Self-priming Centrifugal Pump. Processes, doi: 10.3390/pr7060330.

    15. Yaguang Heng, Bo Hu, Qifeng Jiang, et al. Stall Mode Transformation in the Wide Vaneless Diffuser of Centrifugal Compressors, Energies, 2020, 13(22), 6067; https://doi.org/10.3390/en13226067.

    16. Bo Hu, Dieter Brillert, Hans Josef Dohmen and Friedrich-Karl Benra. Investigation on thrust and moment coefficients of a centrifugal turbomachine, Int. J. Turbomach. Propuls. Power 2018, 3(2), 9: DOI:10.3390/ijtpp3020009.

    17. Bo Hu, Dieter Brillert, Hans Josef Dohmen and Friedrich-Karl Benra. Investigation on the flow in a rotor-stator cavity with centripetal through-flow, Int. J. Turbomach. Propuls. Power 2017, 2, 18; DOI:10.3390/ijtpp2040018.

    18. Fu-qiang Chen, Xiao-dong Ren, Bo Hu, Xue-song Li, Chun-wei Gu, Zhi-jiang Jin. Parametric analysis on multi-stage high pressure reducing valve for hydrogen decompression. International Journal of Hydrogen Energy，2019, 44, doi: 10.1016/j.ijhydene.2019.10.004.

    19. Hongbo Mi, Chuan Wang, Xuanwen Jia, Bo Hu, et al. Hydraulic Characteristics of Continuous Submerged Jet Impinging on a Wall by Using Numerical Simulation and PIV Experiment, sustainability, 2023, 15(6), 5159, doi: https://doi.org/10.3390/su15065159.

    20. 余世达;胡博;李雪松;任晓栋;李想;顾春伟.改进型纯氧-纯氢燃烧Graz循环优化与参数影响规律, 中国电机工程学报, 2024, 44(10):3962-3975.

    21. 米泓博，任晓栋，牛夕莹，胡博*，顾春伟.基于数值模拟的燃机高压盘腔系统流动特性研究, 工程热物理学报, 2023, 44(6):1528-1537.

    22. 于洋，牛夕莹，米泓博，胡博*，船用燃气轮机低压盘腔系统流动特性研究，热能动力工程，2023,44(1):1-8.

    23. 姚钰龙，牛夕莹，王川，胡博*，不同盘面粗糙对低转速多支路预旋盘腔流动特性研究，热能动力工程，2023, 38(1)：9-22.

    24. 邵文博，胡博，李雪松，等, 加工误差对压气机叶珊气动性能的影响，2023,1, 20(1):22-29.

    25. 邵文博，任晓栋，胡博. 高速土工离心机温升的数值模拟, 环境装备工程, 2022, 19(12): 95-103.

    26. 邵文博，任晓栋，胡博. 基于CFD方法的土工离心机数值建模, 环境装备工程, 2022，19(10): 110-119.

    27. 袁寿其, 胡博, 陆伟刚等. 中比转速离心泵多工况设计. 排灌机械工程学报, 2012, 9, 30, (5).

    28. Bo Hu , Shouqi Yuan , Weigang Lu. Optimal design of non-overload centrifugal pump. Advanced material research, ICMSE 2012, 468-471(2012), Page 2357-2363.

    29. 米泓博，任晓栋，胡博*，顾春伟. 基于气热耦合通流方法的气冷涡轮导叶设计校核及优化, 2024 年中国工程热物理学会热机气动热力学和流体机械学术会议, 2024.

    30. 朱啸寒，任晓栋，胡博*，顾春伟.  基于Isight平台的燃气轮机蜂窝密封寿命优化设计，2024 年中国工程热物理学会热机气动热力学和流体机械学术会议, 2024.

    31. Shida Yu, Xiaodong Ren,Bo Hu, Chunwei Gu. Investigation of the influence of different control stratege. Global Power & Propulsion Society (GPPS) 2024.

    32. Botao Lai, Bo Hu, Xuesong Li, Chunwei Gu. Transient Thermal Stress Analysis of Power Turbine Welded Rotor in a Heavy Duty Gas Turbine during Rapid Load Changes. Global Power & Propulsion Society (GPPS) 2024.

    33. 赖伯滔，李雪松，任晓栋，胡博*，顾春伟. 重型燃气轮机动力透平焊接转子优化设计及强度分析，工程热物理年会2023.

    34. 邓洪元，裴吉，胡博，王文杰.重燃中压压气机高压转子盘腔优化设计, 2023 年中国工程热物理学会热机气动热力学和流体机械学术会议, 2023..

    35. 米泓博，任晓栋，牛夕莹, 胡博*，顾春伟. 基于数值模拟的燃机高压盘腔系统流动特性研究，2021 年中国工程热物理学会热机气动热力学和流体机械学术会议, 2021.

    36. 王岩，胡博，牛夕莹等. 燃气轮机预旋进气盘腔流动与换热特性的数值模拟研究，2020 年中国工程热物理学会热机气动热力学和流体机械学术会议, 2020.

    37. Bo Hu, D. Brillert, H.-J. Dohmen, F.-K. Benra. Investigation on the influence of surface roughness on the moment coefficient in a rotor-stator cavity with centripetal through-flow, ASME 2017 Fluids Engineering Division Summer Meeting, Waikoloa, Hawaii, USA.

    38. Bo Hu, Friedrich-Karl Benra, Weigang Lu. Investigation on the solid-liquid flow in the rear chamber of a submersible multi-stage slurry pump, 11th European Conference on Turbomachinery Fluid Dynamics and Thermodynamics 2015, ETC11, Madrid, Spain.

    39. Bo Hu, Friedrich-Karl Benra, Weigang Lu. Investigation on solid-liquid flow in the rear chamber of multi-stage slurry pumps with leakage flow, 16th International Symposium on Transport Phenomena and Dynamics of Rotating Machinery, 2016，ISROMAC, Honululu, Hawaii.

    40. Bo Hu, Shouqi Yuan, Weigang Lu. Numerical optimal design of a non-overload centrifugal pump. ASME 2012 Fluids Engineering Division Summer Meeting, Puerto Rico, USA.

    授权专利：

    1. 胡博，任晓栋，李雪松，顾春伟. 可调出口角度的叶型预旋喷嘴系统和具有其的燃气轮机。

    2. 胡博，任晓栋，李雪松，顾春伟，可变出口气流角的辅助预旋喷嘴及燃气轮机。

    3. 任晓栋，胡博，李雪松等，分流再压缩纯氧燃烧循环系统。

    4. 白小龙，胡博，安宁等，燃气轮机及其密封组件。

    5. 白小龙，胡博，安宁等，密封组件和燃气轮机。

    6. 陆伟刚，胡博，袁寿其等，矿潜泵的一种硬质合金滑动轴承引水冷却润滑系统。
